job description:
ASSISTANT QC SCIENTIST
SYRACUSE, NY

Shift: Nights 6pm-6am, with weekend support

Project Description:
  • Perform Quality Control testing for in-process, release, stability, water, and raw material in a cGMP environment.
  • Perform other key activities such as data review, ensuring laboratory cGMP compliance is maintained, execution of technical transfer and co validation activities, instrumentation verification/preventative maintenance, assisting with laboratory investigations, writing procedures and technical documents as required, and providing communication of business critical information to operations and Quality Control management.
  • This is a first shift and/or second shift position and will include weekend support of the in process laboratory.
Required Skills:

It is preferred that the candidate have analytical experience using Waters HPLC, UV-Vis spectrophotometer, AKTA Explorer, and total organic carbon analyzer

This 6+ month position starts ASAP.

ALPHA'S REQUIREMENT #18-01096
MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE U.S. AS AN HOURLY W2 EMPLOYEE
